About

I'm a newbie web-developer/designer from the city of Chicago, trying to work on awesome things to enrich myself and those around me.

Interests

Incredibly fascinated by information design and the application of technology. In other words, how we can create something sleek, sexy, and easy to use.

Education

Surprise! My degrees from IIT are in chemical engineering and computer science. It sounded really cool at the time...
